article_title: PressTV-Sun to cool down in next 30 years: Study
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Scientists say our Sun will likely enter a cooldown cycle as soon as 2050, but the phase has almost no effect on global warming.

article_title: PressTV-Sun to cool down in next 30 years: Study
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Physicist Dan Lubin at the University of California San Diego and two of his colleges managed to collect and observe relevant data for the past 20 years and came to the conclusion that the giant burning ball of gas in our planetary system might enter a ‚Äúgrand minimum‚Äù period of decreased ultraviolet radiation that would last for some 11 years by mid-century.

article_title: PressTV-Sun to cool down in next 30 years: Study
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: ‚ÄúThe cooldown‚Ä¶ [is] a periodic event during which the Sun‚Äôs magnetism diminishes, sunspots form infrequently, and less ultraviolet radiation (UV) makes it to the surface of the planet,‚Äù researchers noted in a statement earlier this week, adding that ‚Äúthe event is triggered at irregular intervals by random fluctuations related to the Sun‚Äôs magnetic field.‚Äù

article_title: PressTV-Sun to cool down in next 30 years: Study
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: The study, whose results were published in The Astrophysical Journal Letters, said the Sun is likely to be 6.9 percent cooler than its usual lowest amount of activity in the grand minimum.

article_title: PressTV-Sun to cool down in next 30 years: Study
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: According to the researchers, the cooldown phase could echo those experienced in Europe in the mid-17th century, called the ‚ÄúMaunder Minimum,‚Äù or the prolonged sunspot minimum, during which temperatures were low enough to cause London's River Thames to freeze over on a regular basis and to freeze the Baltic Sea to such an extent that Swedish troops were able to invade Denmark in 1658 on foot by marching across the sea ice.

article_title: PressTV-Sun to cool down in next 30 years: Study
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: However, scientists warned that it should not be assumed that the ultra-cooling of the sun would potentially prevent the negative effects of global warming.

article_title: PressTV-Sun to cool down in next 30 years: Study
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: ‚ÄúThe cooling effect of a grand minimum is only a fraction of the warming effect caused by the increasing concentration of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere,‚Äù they said, adding, ‚ÄúAfter hundreds of thousands of years of CO2 levels never exceeding 300 parts per million in air, the concentration of the greenhouse gas is now over 400 parts per million, continuing a rise that began with the Industrial Revolution.‚Äù

article_title: PressTV-Sun to cool down in next 30 years: Study
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: The study estimated that the Sun‚Äôs mid-century cooldown would probably only result in cooling the Earth by some 0.25 percent between 2020 and 2070.

article_title: PressTV-Sun to cool down in next 30 years: Study
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: As a result, the temperature at the surface of our cosmic home would decrease by up to several tenths of a degree Celsius, which is not sufficient to stop global warming, but it could at least soften its effects in part.

article_title: PressTV-Sun to cool down in next 30 years: Study
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: ‚ÄúNow we have a benchmark from which we can perform better climate model simulations.

article_title: PressTV-Sun to cool down in next 30 years: Study
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: We can therefore have a better idea of how changes in solar UV radiation affect climate change,‚Äù said Lubin.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Fastiggi‚Äôs exchange with Ferrara concerning ‚ÄúWait, Wait, It‚Äôs all a mistranslation!‚Äù

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Robert Fastiggi ‚Ä¢ 13 hours ago

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: In the article that I co-authored with Dr. Goldstein, we would have done better to speak of the ‚Äúofficial‚Äù Latin text rather than the ‚Äúoriginal‚Äù Latin text.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: This, though, is no longer an issue because the normative text is the Latin text published in thr AAS.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: propaganda
sentence_text: Mr. Ferrara, however, bases his critique upon an assumption that the ‚Äúgenerous response‚Äù offered to God is a sin.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: propaganda
sentence_text: This, though, is not what AL is saying.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: The generous response is a move away from sin and a move toward God.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: I explain this in my most recent response to Prof. E. Christian Brugger, which can serve as my response to Mr. Ferrara:

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Posted on LifeSiteNews:

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Prof. Brugger is a good theologian and a fine man, but he still seems to believe that AL 303 implies that God is asking people to continue to sin in some cases.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: In his April 22, 2016 article in Catholic World Report, Brugger writes that AL 303 suggests that ‚ÄúGod can be ‚Äòasking‚Äô someone to live in a life-state in which they are objectively violating grave matter.‚Äù Then in a Sept. 28 ‚Äò17 LifeSiteNews article, he states that ‚Äúthe generous response‚Äù owed to God is ‚Äúa certain state that is objectively at variance with the universal command of the Gospel.‚Äù Now Prof. Brugger argues that, because the subject remains ‚Äúthis conscience‚Äù in AL 303, this proves that the ‚Äúgenerous offering owed to God‚Äù is the recognition that one is living ‚Äúcontrary to ‚Äúthe universal command of the Gospel.‚Äù

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Prof. Brugger fails to see that AL 303 clearly distinguishes between a conscience‚Äôs recognition that ‚Äúa given situation is objectively at variance with the general mandate of the Gospel‚Äù and this same conscience‚Äôs subsequent recognition of a ‚Äúgenerous response owed to God in the present circumstances.‚Äù The subject ‚Äúconscience‚Äù might be the same but the object is different.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: The ‚Äúgenerous response‚Äù is not the situation that is at variance with the command of the Gospel but an offering that God is asking amid the mass of impediments even though it may not yet be the perfect objective model.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: What might be this ‚Äúgenerous response?‚Äù Pope Francis does not give an example in AL 303 because he‚Äôs speaking in general terms of the dynamics of conscience.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Moreover, he knows that concrete cases vary widely.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: In our Sept. 26 article in La Stampa, Dr. Goldstein and I provided a hypothetical example of a couple in a purely civil ‚Äúmarriage‚Äù recognizing that God is calling them to live in continence.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: We chose this example deliberately to demonstrate that ‚Äúthe generous response‚Äù could be the ending of a particular sin.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Our example was an attempt to show that Professors Brugger and Seifert are wrong to believe AL 303 implies that God is asking some people to continue to live in an objectively sinful state.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: It‚Äôs really just the opposite.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: AL 303 teaches that conscience will come to recognize that God is asking for a step in the right direction away from sin.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: propaganda
sentence_text: Pope Francis explains this again in AL 305 when he says ‚Äúa small step, in the midst of great human limitations, can be more pleasing to God than a life which appears outwardly in order, but moves through the day without confronting great difficulties.‚Äô‚Äù

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: In a recent interview (http://www.lastampa.it/2017..., the Italian philosopher, Rocco Buttiglione, provides this example for AL 303: ‚ÄúImagine a father who has a sick son and the child improves.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: He still has fever but has stopped vomiting; the child manages to keep in his stomach what he eats and has started a therapy that seems to work.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: The father is happy.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Is he happy about the fact that the child is sick?

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: No, he is pleased that his son gives symptoms of improvement and healing.‚Äù

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: This is what Pope Francis is saying in AL 303.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: God is not happy with situations that are objectively at variance with the command of the Gospel.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: God, however, is happy when people in such situations discern in conscience that He is asking them to make a choice that moves in the right direction‚Äîeven if they still need to progress further toward a more complete fulfillment of His will.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: This is the law of gradualness not the gradualness of the law.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: It is sad that this beautiful and compassionate message of AL 303 has been so completely misunderstood by scholars who have failed to grasp its true meaning.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Chris Ferrara to Robert Fastiggi ‚Ä¢ 9 hours ago

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: I certainly agree that the Latin text is the normative text even if it comes later.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: I certainly do not agree that the Latin text eliminates the grave problems with Amoris Laetitia.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Rather, as I show in my article, it only intensifies them.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: propaganda
sentence_text: With all due respect to Dr. Fastiggi, his argument and that of Buttiglione, that a ‚Äúmove away from sin‚Äù is what is pleasing to God, even if the moral norm is not adhered to, is sophistical.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: What constitutes a ‚Äúmove away‚Äù from sin if not ceasing to commit the sin?

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: No example is provided in AL because none can be.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: The notion is nonsensical.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Just how nonsensical is demonstrated by Dr. Fastiggi‚Äôs claim that by ‚Äúa move away from sin‚Äù in the case of a divorced and ‚Äúremarried‚Äù couple Francis means their agreement to live in continence as brother and sister for the sake of children.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: But that would be ceasing to commit the sin of adultery altogether as it would involve abandoning the pretense that they are married along with the illicit sexual relation itself.

article_title: La Stampa‚Äôs Robert Fastiggi Replies to Chris Ferrara
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Such a couple could always be absolved and receive Holy Communion under the Church‚Äôs constant practice, albeit privately to avoid scandal.

sentence_text: Thus, it took more than a year-and-a-half for the Factory to roll out the old reliable ‚Äúmistranslation‚Äù defense to explain away the infamous paragraph 303 of Amoris Laetita (AL), which reads as follows in the official English translation on the Vatican website:

article_title: Wait!

sentence_text: Yet conscience can do more than recognize that a given situation does not correspond objectively to the overall demands of the Gospel.

sentence_text: It can also recognize with sincerity and honesty what for now is the most generous response which can be given to God, and come to see with a certain moral security that it is what God himself is asking amid the concrete complexity of one‚Äôs limits, while yet not fully the objective ideal.

article_title: Wait!

sentence_text: In other words, the conscience can ‚Äúinform‚Äù a sinner that his continued sinning is not only acceptable to God but is even what God is asking ‚Äúfor now,‚Äù given one‚Äôs particular ‚Äúlimits.‚Äù This outrageous proposition, a form of situation ethics that strikes at the very foundation of Catholic moral teaching, has justly provoked a storm of criticism from lay and clerical defenders of the authentic Magisterium.

article_title: Wait!

article_title: Wait!

article_title: Wait!

sentence_text: Haec autem conscientia agnoscere potest non modo statum quendam ab universali Evangelii mandato obiective dissidere; etiam sincere honesteque agnoscere poteste quod sit liberale responsum in praesenti Deo reddendum atque eadem conscientia firma quadam morali certitudine intellegere illam esse oblationem quam ipse Deus requirit inter rerum impedientium congeriem, quamvis perfectum nondum sit obiectivum exemplar.

article_title: Wait!

sentence_text: Yes, and so what?

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Well, according to Fastiggi and Goldstein, while the English translation reads: ‚Äúwhat for now is the most generous response which can be given to God,‚Äù the Latin employs the word oblationem, which means offering.

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: So, What the Pope Really Means¬Æ is: ‚Äúwhat for now is the most generous offering which can be given to God.‚Äù So, it‚Äôs an offering to God, not a response to God.

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Big difference.

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: But just a moment: how can objectively immoral behavior ever be characterized as an ‚Äúoffering‚Äù to God?

sentence_text: It would seem the Latin version has graver implications than the English because it suggests that falling short of what the moral law requires is an oblation pleasing to God if one‚Äôs ‚Äúlimits‚Äù make obedience to the moral law difficult.

article_title: Wait!
label: propaganda
sentence_text: And that is exactly the nonsense Fastiggi and Goldstein expect us to swallow: ‚ÄúPope Francis is not talking about an offering of an objectively sinful action but a gift of self that moves toward God and the objective moral norm.‚Äù

article_title: Wait!

sentence_text: So, our intrepid presenters of What the Pope Really Means¬Æ would have us believe that objectively immoral behavior, which is the best one can do according ‚Äúthe ‚Äúconcrete complexity of one‚Äôs limits,‚Äù is no longer simply objectively immoral behavior but rather a gift of self because it moves toward morally licit behavior.

article_title: Wait!

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: What about the English locution ‚Äúwhile yet not fully the objective ideal,‚Äù which seems to reduce the negative precepts of the natural law to mere ideals?

article_title: Wait!

sentence_text: Likewise, the definition of the English word ‚Äúexemplar‚Äù is simply: ‚Äúan ideal model.‚Äù

article_title: Wait!

article_title: Wait!

sentence_text: For if moral behavior is now to be viewed as merely ‚Äúexemplary‚Äù rather than divinely mandated by the natural law that binds all men‚Äîincluding Thou Shalt Not Commit Adultery‚Äîthen basic morality becomes a kind of heroic virtue.

sentence_text: Thus, continence cannot realistically be expected, at least ‚Äúfor now‚Äù (AL 303), of the average Joe or Jane with an ‚Äúex‚Äù who has ‚Äúremarried‚Äù and is now mired in the ‚Äúconcrete complexity one‚Äôs limits.‚Äù

article_title: Wait!
label: propaganda
sentence_text: So, as Fastiggi and Goldstein would have it, all the tumult triggered by AL is just a misunderstanding caused by uninformed people who haven‚Äôt consulted the Latin text‚Äîincluding those ignorant Vatican translators.

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: According to their proposed ‚Äúalternate translation‚Äù into English, What the Pope Really Means¬Æ is that objectively immoral behavior one feels unable to correct due to one‚Äôs ‚Äúlimits‚Äù is ‚Äúthe offering that God himself is asking amid the mass of impediments, although it may not yet be the perfect objective model.‚Äù Which is what the official English translation already says but with fewer words.

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: It seems Fastiggi and Goldstein are hoping no one will notice that their linguistic tinkering produces no real change in meaning but only an intensification of its perniciousness.

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Indeed, their ‚Äúproposed alternate translation‚Äù reduces the avoidance of adulterous relations in ‚Äúsecond marriages‚Äù to the ‚Äúperfect objective model.‚Äù Now, how could anyone but a Pharisee expect perfection from people living in adultery?

sentence_text: But wait, there‚Äôs more!

article_title: Wait!
label: propaganda
sentence_text: Our dynamic translators even provide their own dynamic interpretation of AL to mean that the ‚Äúoffering‚Äù to God of which Francis speaks is merely the decision by a divorced and ‚Äúremarried‚Äù couple with children not to end their relationship, which would be the ‚Äúperfect objective model,‚Äù but rather to ‚Äúlive in continence until they may‚Äîafter the hoped for declaration of nullity‚Äîenter into a true marriage.‚Äù That is, they would have Francis affirming John Paul II‚Äôs Familiaris consortio, which repeats the Church‚Äôs constant teaching that continence is required of those who have entered into adulterous ‚Äúsecond marriage,‚Äù failing which they cannot be admitted to the sacraments.

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: But the Fastiggi-Goldstein interpretation is precisely the contrary of the interpretation Francis has assiduously promoted and which Fastiggi and Goldstein just as assiduously ignore: i.e., that people in ‚Äúsecond marriages‚Äù do not have to live in continence, but rather‚Äîin ‚Äúcertain cases‚Äù‚Äîmay continue their adulterous relations while receiving absolution and Holy Communion during a ‚Äúprocess of discernment.‚Äù As we know, in his letter to the bishops of Buenos Aires, published on the Vatican website (in response to a query he himself may have solicited), Bergoglio informed them ‚Äúthere is no other interpretation.‚Äù

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Moreover, the Maltese bishops' ‚Äúguidelines‚Äù for implementing AL, published in L‚ÄôOsservatore Romano‚Äîfor which Bergoglio thanked them‚Äîdeclare thus:

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: If, as a result of the process of discernment, undertaken with ‚Äúhumility, discretion and love for the Church and her teaching, in a sincere search for God‚Äôs will and a desire to make a more perfect response to it‚Äù (AL 300), a separated or divorced person who is living in a new relationship manages, with an informed and enlightened conscience, to acknowledge and believe that he or she are at peace with God, he or she cannot be precluded from participating in the sacraments of Reconciliation and the Eucharist (see AL, notes 336 and 351).

label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: This Pope‚Äôs plan of promulgating a deliberately ambiguous document whose heterodox interpretation and application he would later approve with a series of sub-magisterial winks and nods, both oral and written, is the reason I signed onto the Correctio Filialis.

sentence_text: As Shaw observes of AL: ‚ÄúWhat we [the signers of the Correctio] are saying is that it has become clear that orthodoxy is not what Pope Francis wants us to find there.‚Äù

article_title: Wait!
label: propaganda
sentence_text: In a sense, what Bergoglio is doing is worse than explicit heresy, which could at least be readily identified and denounced as such.

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: But Bergoglio wants the effects of heresy‚Äîundermining Holy Matrimony, Confession and Holy Communion, whose integrity is affirmed verbally‚Äîwithout the guilt of an explicit promulgation.

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: In so acting, he is very much in the mold of Honorius I, who was posthumously anathematized by an ecumenical council (the Third Council of Constantinople) and by his own successor (Leo II) for aiding and abetting the spread of the Monothelite heresy (no human but only a divine will in Christ).

sentence_text: Honorius did so by means of private correspondence with the author of the heresy, endorsing the heresy without ever formally proclaiming it as doctrine.

article_title: Wait!
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: A similar judgment might well befall this Pope, but it is not for us to level it.

sentence_text: Before the last meeting of this Commission the members received two schemas on the same subject: one from Cardinal Ottaviani and another from Cardinal Bea.

sentence_text: As I indicated in my two articles this week, the CIA was between a rock and a hard place.

article_title: FBI IG Report: A Slap On The Wrist
label: propaganda
sentence_text: Moreover, this report did not address whether the Department of Justice or FBI abused the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act to obtain a surveillance order against former Trump campaign advisor Carter Page, or the government‚Äôs reliance on former British intelligence agent Christopher Steele‚Äôs salacious and unverified ‚Äúdossier‚Äù in its FISA court application, which the OIG is investigating separately.

article_title: FBI IG Report: A Slap On The Wrist
label: propaganda
sentence_text: In analyzing the highly anticipated OIG report‚Äôs conclusions, it is clear that either Mr. Horowitz himself decided to pull his punches or that the final version, which had been reviewed by upper echelons in both the FBI and Justice Department before its public release, emerged in a disappointingly watered-down form.

article_title: FBI IG Report: A Slap On The Wrist
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: To be sure, the report faulted Comey for deviating from FBI and Justice Department procedures in handling the probe into Hillary Clinton‚Äôs use of a private e-mail server while she served as Secretary of State, thereby negatively impacting ‚Äúthe perception of the FBI and the department as fair administrators of justice.‚Äù Comey, according to the OIG report, ‚Äúengaged in ad hoc decision making based on his personal views even if it meant rejecting longstanding Department policy or practice.‚Äù

article_title: FBI IG Report: A Slap On The Wrist
label: propaganda
sentence_text: Starting with Comey‚Äôs public announcement on July 5, 2016 criticizing Hillary Clinton and her staff for being ‚Äúextremely careless in their handling of very sensitive, highly classified information,‚Äù but also announcing that the FBI was ‚Äúexpressing to Justice our view that no charges are appropriate in this case,‚Äù Comey was taken to task for insubordination and usurping the authority of the attorney general.

article_title: FBI IG Report: A Slap On The Wrist

sentence_text: He ‚Äúupset the well-established separation between investigative and prosecutorial functions,‚Äù the report said.

article_title: FBI IG Report: A Slap On The Wrist
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Comey‚Äôs follow-up letters to Congress on October 28 and November 6, 2016 were similarly criticized.

article_title: FBI IG Report: A Slap On The Wrist
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: The first letter informed Congress that agents were reopening their probe into Clinton‚Äôs handling of classified material after discovering her e-mails on the laptop of Andrew Weiner, the husband of Clinton‚Äôs top aide Huma Abedin.

article_title: FBI IG Report: A Slap On The Wrist
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: This letter was followed on November 6, 2016 by Comey‚Äôs statement that the review of the additional information had been completed and that the FBI remained convinced that charges were not appropriate.

article_title: FBI IG Report: A Slap On The Wrist
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Comey acted against the advice of senior Justice Department officials in making these disclosures the way he did.

article_title: FBI IG Report: A Slap On The Wrist
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: The OIG report was highly critical of the FBI‚Äôs failure to take immediate action on the Weiner laptop when they first learned about it in late September 2016, rather than waiting another month so close to the election.

label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: What is Ebola?

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Initial symptoms can include fever, headache, joint and muscle aches, weakness, diarrhoea, vomiting, stomach pain lack of appetite and in some cases internal and external bleeding, according to WHO.

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: The latter occurred in a village near the Ebola River, from which the disease takes its name.

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Why is it so dangerous?

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: The average Ebola fatality rate is about 50 percent.

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: But the rates have varied from 25 percent to 90 percent in recent outbreaks.

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: There is as of yet no proven cure available for Ebola, though some vaccines are being tested.

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province

sentence_text: Some people who have recovered from Ebola have developed long-term complications, such as joint and vision problems.

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province

sentence_text: Why does it keep coming back?

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province
label: non-propaganda

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province
label: non-propaganda

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province

article_title: DRC: Fresh Ebola outbreak kills two in Equateur Province

sentence_text: The Sun goes through regular cycles of solar minimums and solar maximums, which are periods where the Sun is either quite calm (the minimum) or incredibly active (the maximum).

article_title: The Sun is getting cooler and dimmer, but scientists aren‚Äôt worried
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: During a solar minimum, the Sun produces far fewer solar flares and sunspots, and as a result, much less ultraviolet radiation is shot out into space and towards Earth.

article_title: Archbishop Hebda and McCarrick's Scandal
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Every time Mass is celebrated, the priest prays that Jesus will ‚Äúlook not on our sins but on the faith of [his] Church‚Ä¶ .‚Äù That‚Äôs been an important prayer for me in the time that I have been serving this archdiocese, well aware of our sins but equally aware of the strong and vibrant faith of this local Church.

article_title: Archbishop Hebda and McCarrick's Scandal
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: I‚Äôve been praying that prayer even more earnestly in these past weeks as the Church in the United States has once again come face-to-face with its sins, with reports that former cardinal Theodore McCarrick, one of the most prominent Churchmen in the United States in the last quarter century, has been accused of abusing two minors and sexually harassing or assaulting a number of seminarians and young priests.

article_title: Archbishop Hebda and McCarrick's Scandal
label: propaganda
sentence_text: To make matters worse (if that is even possible), evidence has surfaced that indicates that a bishop, as well as some priests and laity, had brought the allegations about misconduct with seminarians to the attention of Church authorities but to no avail: Archbishop McCarrick was nonetheless ‚Äúpromoted‚Äù to become the archbishop in our nation‚Äôs capital, and elevated to the College of Cardinals.

article_title: Archbishop Hebda and McCarrick's Scandal
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: While I realize that it is not always easy to evaluate the credibility of those bringing allegations, and that there‚Äôs often a tendency to believe those we know over those we don‚Äôt, I don‚Äôt think that the Church in the United States will rest ‚Äî and confidence will be restored ‚Äî until the matter is independently investigated and explained, and assurances are given that there are safeguards in place to make sure that something like this couldn‚Äôt happen again.

article_title: Archbishop Hebda and McCarrick's Scandal
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: The matter has been particularly troubling to me personally due to the fact that I had served in the Archdiocese of Newark as coadjutor archbishop from November 4, 2013, to March 25, 2016, when I was named archbishop here.

label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: It was while I was in Newark that I was introduced to then-Cardinal McCarrick.

article_title: Archbishop Hebda and McCarrick's Scandal
label: non-propaganda

label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: I can state unequivocally that I learned of those settlements only in June of this year, as news broke about the unrelated claim that had been filed in the Archdiocese of New York.

article_title: Archbishop Hebda and McCarrick's Scandal
label: non-propaganda

article_title: Archbishop Hebda and McCarrick's Scandal
label: non-propaganda

label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: By the time I arrived in Newark in November 2013, the 2005 and 2007 settlements were apparently considered ancient history.

article_title: Archbishop Hebda and McCarrick's Scandal

article_title: Archbishop Hebda and McCarrick's Scandal
label: non-propaganda

sentence_text: One aspect of Pope Francis‚Äô character that seems little-explored by the Catholic and secular media alike is his apparent disdain for contemplative religious life ‚Äì a facet of Catholic life that could be described as the most purely religious of all the Church‚Äôs undertakings.

label: propaganda

sentence_text: The Church‚Äôs teaching is clear that the homosexual inclination is not in itself sinful, but it is intrinsically disordered in a way that renders any man stably afflicted by it unfit to be a priest.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: propaganda

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: propaganda
sentence_text: Such wickedness should be hated with a perfect hatred.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Christian charity itself demands that we should hate wickedness just as we love goodness.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: But while hating the sin, we must never hate the sinner, who is called to conversion, penance, and renewed communion with Christ and His Church, through His inexhaustible mercy.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: At the same time, however, the love and mercy which we are called to have even for the worst of sinners does not exclude holding them accountable for their actions through a punishment proportionate to the gravity of their offense.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: In fact, a just punishment is an important work of love and mercy, because, while it serves primarily as retribution for the offense committed, it also offers the guilty party an opportunity to make expiation for his sin in this life (if he willingly accepts his punishment), thus sparing him worse punishment in the life to come.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Motivated, therefore, by love and concern for souls, I stand with those calling for justice to be done upon the guilty.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: The sins and crimes of McCarrick, and of far too many others in the Church, bring suspicion and mistrust upon many good and virtuous priests, bishops, and cardinals, and suspicion and mistrust upon many great and respectable seminaries and so many holy and faithful seminarians.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: The result of the first instance of mistrust harms the Church and the very good work we do in Christ‚Äôs name.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: It causes others to sin in their thoughts, words, and deeds ‚Äî which is the very definition of scandal.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus

label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: I said that I was tempted to despair in light of all of this.

sentence_text: However, that temptation quickly passed, thanks be to God.

label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: No matter how large the problem, we know that we are called to go forward in faith, to rely upon God‚Äôs promises to us, and to work hard to make every bit of difference we can, within our spheres of influence.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: I have recently had the opportunity to talk directly with our seminarians about these very pressing matters, and I have begun to, and will continue to, talk with the priests of the diocese, as well as the faithful, in person and through my weekly column and homilies, making things as clear as I can, from my perspective.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: Here now, I offer a few thoughts to those of my diocese:

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: In the first place, we must continue to build upon the good work which we have accomplished in protecting the youth and vulnerable of our diocese.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: This is a work on which we can never rest in our vigilance, nor our efforts to improve.

label: non-propaganda

label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: This is to keep you very close to God.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: And by extension, live a chaste and celibate life so that you can completely give your life to Christ, the Church, and the people whom he has called you to serve.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus

sentence_text: God will give you the graces to do so.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus

label: non-propaganda
sentence_text: And if you are unchastely propositioned, abused, or threatened (no matter by whom), or if you directly witness unchaste behavior, report it to me.

sentence_text: I will not stand for this in my diocese any more than in our seminaries.

sentence_text: It will be addressed quickly and justly.

sentence_text: If you have directly witnessed sexual advances or any type of abuse, bring it forward as well.

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus

article_title: Bishop Morlino Targets ‚ÄòHomosexual Subculture‚Äô in the Church, Calls for Reparation to Sacred Heart of Jesus
